detail_desc: V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with scalloping at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length lace dress with adjustable spaghetti straps, a V-neck and concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with pleats and a flared skirt. Lined in contrasting colour jersey.
Kangol x H&M. Short turtleneck top in a soft rib knit with an embroidered Kangol logo at the top and long sleeves.
Tiered skirt in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.
Tube scarf in a soft cotton knit.
Short jacket in soft imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a straight-cut hem.
V-neck top in soft pointelle jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck top in a soft velvet weave with lace at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cold shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with glittery seams at the sides, a ribbed trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Track jacket in sturdy cotton-blend jersey with a hood and a zip down the front. Long, cuffed raglan sleeves, a zipped chest pocket, discreet side pockets and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in imitation leather with mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Long raglan sleeves with mesh details. Seamless.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets and tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lace-covered V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Reflective details. Lined.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a print motif and appliqué on the front. Two-way zip at the front and a detachable tab with a carabiner hook. One outer compartment with a zip at the back, two inner compartments, one in mesh, and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 31 cm.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with embroidery on the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Set with a hairband and top in cotton jersey and a pair of dungaree shorts in broderie anglaise. Hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front. Top with short sleeves. Dungaree shorts with elastication at the back of the waist, a heart shaped front pocket and straps with a button fastening.
Shirt in an airy cotton and linen weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in patterned transparent mesh with slits in the sides and long sleeves with thumbholes at the ends. Sewn-in jersey underdress.
Twill cap with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey made from a linen blend with a deep V-neck at the back and straight-cut hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with a spotted mesh veil and lace rabbit ears.
Airy top with a small frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce at the ends, and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce on one side.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Flared, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and decorative gathers at the front.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Reflective details. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a hood, and raw-edge cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit sweatpants made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Flared, calf-length skirt in airy seersucker made from a cotton and modal blend. High, elasticated waist with gathers and a small frill trim at the top, and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Leggings in cotton jersey with concealed elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a frill detail down the legs.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Gently flared dress in glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short, butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.

Oxford cotton shirt with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pointed court shoes in suede with a decorative leather bow at the front and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Glasses chain in chunky, textured metal chain with plastic loop fasteners. Can also be worn as a necklace. Length 80 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline at the back.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a collar and V-neck with a seam centre front. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Narrow, fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with a strap at the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Bomber jacket in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, denim-look leggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs with flared hems. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y).
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable detachable straps with a metal fastener and crossover back. Chest pocket, a seam at the waist with buttons at the sides, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Tapered legs.
Fabric sandals with a rhinestone decoration on the front, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Insoles in satin made from recycled polyester, and trainer soles.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ankle-length trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Single-breasted jacket in marled linen with decorative stitching, narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam at the waist and peplum.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a fleece-lined drawstring hood with a faux fur trim, two-way zip down the front and double wind flap with a hook and loop fastening. Concealed zipped pocket under the wind flaps, flap chest and front pockets and one sleeve pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and one inner pocket. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Polyester filling. Quilted lining.
